net.jawr.web.resource.handler.reader
Interface TextResourceReader

All Superinterfaces:
ResourceReader
All Known Implementing Classes:
CssSmartSpritesResourceReader, FileSystemResourceReader, GrailsServletContextResourceReader, PathPrefixedServletContextResourceReader, ResourceGeneratorReaderWrapper, ServletContextResourceReader
public interface TextResourceReader
extends ResourceReader

This interface is implemented by objects which can read text resources. (JS or CSS)

Author:
Ibrahim Chaehoi
